Config.Name: NO_STALLED_REMOVAL_QBIT_TAG
Config.Description: Downloads in qBittorrent tagged with this tag will not be killed even if they are stalled

Config.Name: PERMITTED_ATTEMPTS
Config.Description: Defines how many times a download has to be caught as stalled or stuck downloading metadata before it is removed

Config.Name: REMOVE_UNMONITORED
Config.Description: Steers whether downloads belonging to unmonitored movies/TV shows are removed from the queue

Config.Name: REMOVE_ORPHANS
Config.Description:
Steers whether orphan downloads are removed from the queue
Orphan downloads those that do not belong to any movie/tvshow anymore (since the movie/TV show was deleted post request)
Orphan downloads are not added to the block list

Config.Name: REMOVE_METADATA_MISSING
Config.Description: Steers whether downloads stuck obtaining meta data are removed from the queue

Config.Name: REMOVE_STALLED
Config.Description:
Steers whether stalled downloads with no connections are removed from the queue
Stalled downloads are added to the blocklist, so that they are not re-requested in the future

Config.Name: REMOVE_FAILED
Config.Description:
Steers whether failed downloads with no connections are removed from the queue
Failed downloads are not added to the blocklist

Config.Name: REMOVE_TIMER
Config.Description: Sets the frequency how often the queue is cleaned form orphan and stalled downloads (in minutes)

Config.Name: TEST_RUN
Config.Description: Allows you to safely try out this tool. If active, downloads will not be removed.

Config.Name: LOG_LEVEL
Config.Description:
Sets the level at which logging will take place. INFO will only show changes applied to Radarr/Sonarr
VERBOSE will show when script runs (even if it results in no change)
Permissible Values: CRITICAL, ERROR, WARNING, INFO, VERBOSE, DEBUG
